entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
